job_tasks.phrase: Drive digital transformation by understanding client needs and crafting seamless online experiences.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly relates to understanding client needs and aligning them with business objectives (digital transformation, online experiences).

job_tasks.phrase: Take charge of strategic recommendations and elevate our app and web services.
job_tasks.justification: This indicates a need to understand the business strategy and make recommendations for improvement in digital services.

job_tasks.phrase: You achieve this by translating customer needs into value propositions and comprehensive end-to-end solutions.
job_tasks.justification: This highlights the core business function of translating customer requirements into tangible solutions that provide value.

job_tasks.phrase: ensuring they are aligned with the latest developments in technology, digitalization, legislation, and regulations.
job_tasks.justification: This shows an understanding of external business and regulatory environments impacting the digital strategy.

job_tasks.phrase: Additionally, you consider the requirements and frameworks set by both internal and external stakeholders, including development teams and regulatory bodies.
job_tasks.justification: This emphasizes the need to understand and incorporate requirements from various stakeholders, a key aspect of business understanding.
While broad, 'crafting online experiences' implies the development and implementation of digital products.

job_tasks.phrase: comprehensive end-to-end solutions. These solutions encompass the entire process from initial concept to final implementation
job_tasks.justification: This clearly describes the software development lifecycle, from ideation to deployment of solutions.

job_tasks.phrase: We are responsible for Internet Banking, the ABN AMRO app and new digital initiatives.
job_tasks.justification: This indicates involvement in the development and maintenance of existing digital products and new initiatives.

job_tasks.phrase: You will work in a pool of Business Developers with a dedicated focus on one of the teams within the Grid. Here you will be part of a scrum team using an Agile way of working:
job_tasks.justification: Working within a scrum team using Agile methodologies is a hallmark of modern software development practices.

job_tasks.phrase: Being part of four multidisciplinary dev-ops teams.
job_tasks.justification: Directly mentions involvement in dev-ops teams, which are central to software development and deployment.

job_tasks.phrase: bringing our services to the digital environment, offering customers the seamless digital experience they deserve.
job_tasks.justification: This implies the development and deployment of digital services to create a user experience.

job_tasks.phrase: bring our digital offering (app and web) to the next level!
job_tasks.justification: This signifies a focus on improving and developing existing digital products (app and web).

soft_skills.phrase: translating customer needs into value propositions and comprehensive end-to-end solutions.
consider the requirements and frameworks set by both internal and external stakeholders, including development teams and regulatory bodies.
working together as a dynamic multi-cultural team.
aligned with the latest developments in technology, digitalization, legislation, and regulations.
translating customer needs into value propositions and comprehensive end-to-end solutions.
working in a scrum team using an Agile way of working
embrace failures as a necessary step to learn quickly.
elevate our app and web services.
bringing our services to the digital environment
bring our digital offering (app and web) to the next level!

classification.rationale: This role focuses heavily on business understanding, strategic recommendations, and improving user experience within existing digital channels. While it mentions 'digital transformation' and 'Agile way of working', it lacks specific technical tasks related to ML/GenAI model development, prompt engineering, or MLOps, which are central to the ML Engineer or GenAI Engineer profiles.
